thread.title: Goldman Sachs picks Netflix, Chevron, Facebook as 2016 earnings winners
thread.title_full: Goldman Sachs picks Netflix, Chevron, Facebook as 2016 earnings winners - MarketWatch

author: Sue Chang
title: Goldman Sachs picks Netflix, Chevron, Facebook as 2016 earnings winners
text: Netflix Inc. NFLX, +0.65% is expected to see its 2016 earnings per share jump 49% in 2016, making it Goldman Sachs' top pick for earnings growth in 2016. Chevron Corp. CVX, +3.56% Facebook Inc. FB, +1.25% and Salesforce.com Inc. CRM, +1.32% are also expected to report at least a 30% rise in EPS while Celgene Corp. CELG, +2.21% is projected to post a 25% increase in EPS. Netflix and Facebook scored well for sales growth with Goldman projecting Facebook will see sales rise 35% while Netflix will post an increase of 27%. The investment bank earlier this week cut the S&P 500's SPX, +0.92% year-end target to 2,000 from 2,100 and lowered its 2015 earnings-per-share forecast to $109 from $114, a 3% decline from last year. In 2016, Goldman sees the S&P climbing 5% to 2,100, with earnings per share at $120.
